messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message:
Hey team :wave:
Bank of America is asking for UDF examples to help get them started. Have other customers asked for this before? Do we have a response that works for this or any UDFs that we are comfortable sharing?
```Can you please provide us sample UDFs for the use cases below:

1.       UDF to read xml or json file from Instabase Drive.

2.       UDF to read output of Refiner/Table Refiner.

3.       UDF for writing data to a file on Instabase Drive.```
cc @Balaram, app-eng uses these quite extensively
@sudeep do you know how to reference the root flow folder in a udf rather than the root_output_folder
i ended up hardcoding an absolute file path but knowing how to use relative would be nice :slightly_smiling_face:

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: @Justin thank you SO much for helping with this! :instabasenew: :heart:

happy to send you more examples of this too @Justin â€” let me know if you want more references. This is an important starting point for UDFs in Flow: https://www.instabase.com/docs/reference/apps/flow/udfs-in-flow/

In the IBFile section it shows how to read / write files in a sample UDF. That would cover (1) and (3)

For (2), they should use the ParsedIBOCR interface. @shaunak should have a description and documentation for the ParsedIBOCR interface (the way you can read data from the IBOCR that a Refiner row generates)
Thanks @dlluncor the docs were quite useful. That plus recipe book (shout out to plex) I was able to create all 3 flows in an hour
